title: Stacey Solomon dreams about boyfriend Joe Swash cheating on her
text:
To view this video please enable JavaScript, and consider upgrading to a web browser that supports HTML5 video

Stacey Solomon has admitted that she has dreamed about boyfriend Joe Swash cheating on her.

The pair have been together for four years and welcomed their first son Rex in May 2019.

But speaking on Loose Women, the 30-year-old revealed that during her sleep she has often imagined scenarios in which Joe has cheated and which have led to her waking up in the morning in a pretty foul mood.

Understandable, really.

‘I’ve dreamt before that Joe’s cheated on me,’ she shared on the panel.

‘Obviously he never has but in my dreams, it feels so real and I wake up with the right hump with him. He’s like, “Are you alright, Stace?” and I’m like, “No!”‘

Stacey and Joe have been dating for four years (Picture: Getty)

The X Factor star turned TV presenter recently admitted that she sometimes feels ‘guilty’ about having children with different fathers; Stacey had her first child Zachary, 11, with her childhood boyfriend Dean Cox at the young age of 17 and had Leighton, seven, with ex-fiancé Aaron Barnham.

She welcomed Rex at 37 weeks in May, her first child with 37-year-old Joe.

Stacey and Joe welcomed baby boy Rex in May (Picture: Instagram)

‘There’s a stigma about having babies with different partners. I’ve definitely felt pressure from people – people I don’t know, and even people I do know,’ she said.

‘Life is so much more complicated with kids from different dads, for sure,’ she continued, speaking to Closer.

‘There are definitely dynamics I’ve had to work around, and it’s not as straightforward as a conventional family.

‘But it’s wonderful at the same time – I’m so glad I moved forward from those relationships because it wouldn’t have been right to stay in them.’
